title: New Clash Gamemode
body:
Wondering if a regular weekly Clash Gamemode could be made, alongside the 3 consecutive day Clash Game mode, my friends and I have school and cannot play 3 consecutive days even if it is the holidays, wondering if you could implement this riot,

thanks

replies.body: If i recall (i haven't looked at it recently) it's not having to play 3 consecutive days, there is just a tournament each day.
